transcript:
Customer: Hello?

Executive: Hello? Hello? Hello? Ji, main Indiamart se phone kar rahi hu, se baat ho rahi hai?
Customer: Rajiv?
Executive: Hanji, main Rajiv se baat kar rahi hu. Sir, aapka number diya hai, ji ne.
Customer: Hanji.
Executive: Aur, jaise ki main dekh rahi hu aapne complaint raise kiya hai ki buyleads mein koi issue aa raha hai requirement mein.
Customer: Han.
Executive: Ye complaint raise kiya hai, to bataiye abhi kya issue aa raha hai?
Customer: Isme hum koi bhi lead aati hai na, usse call karte hai to wo batate hai bhaiya hamari to requirement hi nahi hai, waise hi wo dal dete hai.
Executive: Matlab sabhi buyleads mein aisa ho raha hai?
Customer: Hanji?
Executive: Sabhi jitni bhi buyleads consume kari hai aapne, jitni bhi consume kar rahe hai, sabhi buyleads mein same issue aa raha hai?
Customer: Nahi nahi, har baar hi har jo jis bhi lead pe uthake hum phone karte hai, call karte hai ya unko message karte hai, wo mana kar dete hai bhaiya hamari to koi requirement hi nahi hai. Humne to photo search kiya tha aur inhone requirement dal di.
Executive: Kisi particular category ki buylead mein issue aa raha hai ya phir sabhi mein?
Customer: Ye sab mein hi aa raha hai.
Executive: Ek second hold kar lijiye ga.

Executive: Last aapne buylead abhi aaj ki date mein bhi consume kari hai?
Customer: Hmm.
Executive: Right, to in sabhi pe same issue aa raha hai aapko?
Customer: Nahi wo customer ye bolta hai na ki bhaiya hamari to requirement hi nahi hai. Kisne dal di hamare naam se requirement? Koi farzi lead dalte ho aap?
Executive: Farzi lead hum nahi dalte, main aapko bata deti hu, ye dekhiye. Aap, aapko jo problem hai sorry for that. Abhi dekhiye main aapki new account manager, main hi account manage karungi. Next time se kuch bhi issue hota hai aap seedha is number pe call karke.
Customer: Madam abhi tak isme ek bhi lead nahi mili humko ek bhi, ye mano aap.
Executive: Abhi dekhiye agar abhi aap, main aapko iska solution bata deti hu, abhi aap login hai profile pe?
Customer: Han?
Executive: Profile pe login hai?
Customer: Kya?
Executive: Profile pe aap login hai?
Customer: Han, login kar lunga.
Executive: Aap login kar lijiye, main aapko ek baar process bata rahi thi, bata deti hu iska solution bhi, aap ek baar login kar lijiye.

Customer: Kar raha hu.
Executive: Next time se agar koi bhi issue aa raha hai na buyleads ke regarding ya kaise bhi, to aap direct is number pe call karke mujhse baat kijiyega, theek hai? Call number hai.
Executive: Kyunki aapka account main hi manage karungi to wo mere paas update aayega phir main call karungi to number post kiya jaata hai. Aapko easy rahega ki aap direct is number pe call kar lijiye.
Customer: Hanji?
Executive: Next time se koi bhi aapko issue aata hai buyleads ke regarding ya kuch bhi to aapke account se regarding, to aap isi number pe call kar lijiyega, theek hai?
Customer: Han, abhi maine wo login kar liya.
Executive: Login kar liya? Ab buyleads wale section mein jaaiye.
Customer: Buylead.
Executive: Hanji. Han. Right isme aapko abhi recent wale, recent wale tab pe click kariye.
Customer: Recent?
Executive: Hanji.
Customer: Buylead. No relevant buylead found aa raha hai isme.
Executive: Nahi mere system pe to show kar raha hai. Aapne koi filter to use nahi kiya hai?
Customer: Accha recent. Recent wale mein right. Han recent wale pe aa gaya.
Executive: Abhi dekhiye ab jaise ki niche likha hoga two days, two days ago for example likha hai Lakshmi statue ki lead aayi hui hai. Correct?
Customer: Han.
Executive: To aap dekh rahe hai ab usme agar aap buyer details ko dekhoge jaise right mein likha hai buyer details member since teen mahine, requirement 16. Likha hai?
Customer: Han.
Executive: To kya hota hai sir ki agar, agar kya hota hai agar aapke paas for example 20 lead aayi hui hai. Kya?
Executive: For example agar aapke paas 20 leads aayi hui hai, buyleads aayi hui hai, theek hai? To main aapko ye to nahi bolti sabhi ke sabhi aapki fake matlab sabhi ke sabhi profit dengi, koi fake nahi hai, fake hoti hai but hume na kuch cheeze check karni hoti hai. First thing, jab bhi aap koi buylead consume karte ho hamesha pehle buyer ki details check kiya karo. Jaise ki abhi isme likha hai ki teen mahine se deal karta hai ye buyer, right? Lakshmi statue wala. To jo banda abhi naya aaya hai teen mahine se deal karta hai iske chance ho sakte hai ki ye bol de ki requirement nahi hai maine time pass ke liye call kar liya isme chances ho sakte hai. To thoda niche scroll kariye. Kiski lead dekhiye red red stone bearing pillar. Ispe kya likha hai buyer details member since 10 saal. 10 saal se wo member hai. Ab khud hi sochiye jo banda itne saalon se kaam kar raha hai 10 se 12 saal se wo to time pass ke liye aise fake lead nahi hogi. Uske to chance nahi honge ki wo aapko aisa bole. To jab bhi buylead aap dekhte ho na requirement quantity aapke paas lead hai wo sab dekhne ke sath sath buyer ki detail bhi check kiya karo wo sabse important hota hai. Ab aap aisa buyer agar itna saalon purana buyer hai iske chance nahi honge ki aapko fake matlab bataye ki maine to aise hi call kar liya requirement nahi thi right ye to aap bhi mante ho. Ab jo paanch mahine purane teen mahine purane do mahine purane inke matlab inka chances hai ki ye bol sakte hai ha maine aise hi kar liya tha. Ek to sabse pehle ye check kiya kijiye tab buylead consume kariye. Dusra kuch buyleads pe aapko dikhega na GST verified green mein likha hua. Han. Jyada se jyada wo buyer, wo jyada se jyada us buyer ki lead consume kijiye kyunki kya hota hai wo verified buyer hote hai. Indiamart ke taraf se right? GST. In cheezon pe dekhiye. Jaise likha hai na green mein verified buyer likha hoga verified user ya GST verified. To wo aap dekhoge wo sabhi pe nahi hai wo sirf kuch hi logo pe likha hua hai kuch hi buyer ke product pe right? Ji. Usme hota hai kyunki verified buyers hote hai matlab trustworthy jo ki fake nahi hote impossible hai ki ye fake nikle. To hamesha jyada se jyada lead consume kariye jo verified buyer ho uske baad buyer ki details check kariye. Isme aap khud hi dekhiyega jab aap kuch aise details check kar karke lead consume karoge for sure aapko kuch dino mein khud hi changes dikh jayenge ki fake buylead nahi niklegi. Theek hai sir? To thodi si ji abhi dekhiye do char mahine se jo banda baitha hai wo to time pass ke liye kar sakta hai isko to main aapko ye bhi nahi bolti ki nahi nahi sabhi lead sahi niklengi. Nikalti hai kuch buyers karte hai jo abhi naya naya start kiya hai. Upar filter hai sir usko use kariye. Humko do saal ho gaye isse jude hue aur humko aaj tak ek bhi customer lead nahi mili. Kaise mane madam?
Executive: Kya?
Customer: Network issue ho raha hai madam, aawaz kat kat ke aa rahi hai.
Executive: Hanji? Aawaz aa rahi hai?
Customer: Han ab aa rahi hai.
Executive: Hanji main ye keh rahi hu ki dekhiye aapne request kiya hua hai. Aapka Indiamart account manager last experience aapka kaise raha isliye maine aapko call kiya hai. Agar pehle aapko kuch bhi problem aayi hai uske liye sorry for that. Abhi jaise main aapko guide kar rahi hu aap trust rakhiyega. Jaise main guide kar rahi hu aap aise karte jaaiye koi bhi problem hoti hai mujhe is number pe call kijiye main instant reply karke aapko solution bataungi. Aap khud hi changes mujhe batayenge ki ha pehle se changes hai. Aap please is baar trust karke dekhiye main aapke account pe kaam kar rahi hu agar kuch bhi hume lagta hai ki uske hisab se jaise category change karenge, mapping change karenge jaise bhi hume requirement lagega. But aap jaise main keh rahi hu us hisab se aap ek baar check karke buylead consume kariye aapko for sure changes dikh jayenge. Theek hai?
Customer: Theek hai madam. Ye number aapke hai?
Executive: Hanji, to aap save kar lijiye. Koi bhi issue aata hai isi pe call kariye ga. Main aapko instant reply dungi, don't worry, theek hai? Thoda sa wo karo humko abhi se kya hai ki do saal ho gaye bilkul bhi wo nahi ho raha hai na kuch chalo chota mota koi to mil jaata. Account main samajh rahi hu agar koi invest karta hai isliye karta hai taaki profit ho. Agar usko profit nahi milega to problem hi hogi ye to aapki baat genuine hai. Han. Isme to main agree karti hu aapke sath. Abhi jaise main aapko bata rahi hu aap aise follow kijiye. Agar nahi changes aate then aap mujhe boliyega ya koi issue aata hai mujhe call kijiye ga main instant active hoke aapko wo bataungi solution, theek hai? Aur aap iske alawa koi issue aa raha hai?
Customer: Nahi aur koi issue nahi hai bas yahi samasya hai. Kyunki hum rozana phone karte hai rozana bhaiya hamare to requirement thi nahi humne to photo dekhi thi aur bas ye search ki thi google bas ye bata dete hai.
Executive: Filter use kijiye. Buyer ki details check kijiye right? Ye sab cheeze check kijiye ga aur baki proper active rahiye time to time din mein ek se do buyleads to jarur consume kijiye.
Customer: Ji.
Executive: Theek hai sir?
Customer: Theek hai. Aapko abhi jo aapne complaint raise kari thi ye buyleads ke regarding ye main close kar du abhi?
Customer: Han ab to close kar do aap koi dikkat nahi hai. Lekin humko jo ho jaye matlab.
Executive: Hanji samajh gayi to aapko na abhi complaint raise karne ki need nahi hai next time se is number pe call kariye ga. Main aapki call receive karungi. Abhi main ek complaint close kar du?
Customer: Kar do kar do close. Aur aapko na sir ye complaint close karte hi abhi do teen minute mein na mail pe feedback ke liye aayega to please usme satisfied mark kar dijiyega.
Executive: Theek hai.
Executive: Okay ji, thank you.
summary:
Concerns:

- Customer reports receiving irrelevant buyleads.

- States that leads deny having any requirements.



Resolution:

- Executive explained how to filter and check buyleads.

- Advised checking buyer details and GST verification.

- Provided direct contact number for future issues.



Next Steps: 

- Executive will close the complaint.

- Customer to provide satisfied feedback on mail.



Alert (If Any):

None

@@@Sentiment:

- Angry -> Satisfied



@@@Key Topics:

- buyleads, filters, buyer details, gst verification
